The Evillious Chronicles:
Wrath Arc Characters

The sole feeling left behind
Is overflowing wrath.
—And Then the Girl Went Mad ―Ending Tale on a Moonlit Night―

Characters associated with Nemesis Sudou and the Leviantan Civil War.

Nemesis Sudou

ネメシス＝スドウNEMESHISU=SUDOU

An ex-assassin of PN codenamed No. 8. She is represented by GUMI.

Nikolay Tolle

ニコライ＝トールNIKORAI=TOORU

A man who watched over Nemesis while she was growing up.

Kayo Sudou

カヨ＝スドウKAYO=SUDOU

Nemesis' mother. She is portrayed by Megurine Luka.

Mr. Ziz

ジズさんJIZU-san

Nemesis' pet octopus.

Narcissius Kissos

ナルシス＝キッソスNARUSHISU=KISSOSU

Leader of the criminal gang Zeus and Nemesis' old friend.

Shakuson

シャクソンSHAKUSON

Nemesis' neighbor and later lover.

Tony Ausdin

トニー＝オースディンTONII=OOSUDIN

A Union State of Evillious general and war criminal. He is represented by Tonio.

Mr. Pere Noel

Mr(ミスター).(.)Pere(ペール) ( )Noel(ノエル)MISUTAA. PEERU NOERU

Nemesis' boss. He is represented by KAITO.
